transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan sir aawaj aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir.
Executive: Hmm. Main bol raha tha mere ko hai na woh uska ek list chahiye tha.
Customer: Jo apne apna soap ke boxes nahi aate kya?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Chhote wale soaps aate dekho apne.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Konse?
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Ye sir aapne 96 pe call kiya hai kya?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Aapne 96 pe call kar diya hai kya?
Customer: Are mera number save nahi tumhara IndiaMART pe jaake call kiya.
Executive: Achha achha achha.
Executive: Achha dikat matlab kya matlab dikat kya aa rahi hai aapko matlab kis chiz ki chahiye aapko?
Customer: Haan apne sabun ke boxes rehte hai na?
Executive: Haan haan, thik hai.
Customer: Mithai mithai ke boxes dekho chhote wale boxes.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Corrugated chhote boxes nahi rehte woh? Jismein apan mithai dete, gift hampers dete ya soap dete chhoti soap ke bhi boxes bante dekho.
Executive: Achha samajh gaya.
Customer: Toh uski jo machine banata hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Uske number chahiye mere ko jo machine.
Executive: Banata hai haan.
Customer: Jo soap boxes banata woh nahi uski machine jo banata woh.
Executive: Achha uski machine banata hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uski machine jo banata hai wohi chahiye na sir aapko?
Customer: Haan machinery. Uska uska naam kya aata hai waise?
Customer: Hmm naam uska. Usko bolte kya hai waise kyunki woh search karunga tabhi milega na woh.
Customer: Woh chhote corrugated boxes rehte woh chhote size mein.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Achha. Toh woh aapko matlab wohi main puch raha tha machinery ko waise bolte kya hai woh jo corrugated boxes jo corrugated box jo banati jo machine woh machine ko bolte kya hai waise?
Customer: Woh toh ya machine boxes making machine waise corrugated box machine.
Executive: Achha achha achha achha.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Chalo ek baar main search kar leta hu aur sir mera number aap save kar lijiye. Haan jo chhote boxes haan woh bade boxes nahi thik hai.
Executive: Chhote abhi main ek kaam karunga main aapko main whatsapp pe share kar dunga pehle ek baar dikha dunga main.
Customer: Haan thik hai.
Executive: Haan aur sir abhi na ye number aap mera aapne customer care number pe call kar diya hai toh ek ticket raise ho gayi hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Toh abhi isko main close kar du phir?
Customer: Kar do na sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Sir woh close karne ke baad sir ek mail jayegi woh usme aap woh satisfied ka waha pe de dena.
Customer: Thik hai woh sab kar dunga main aap bas mein koi ek baar mera kaam kara do.
Executive: Chalo thik hai main ye kar deta hu aapko bas.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs a list of machine manufacturers.

- Wants machine that makes small corrugated boxes.



Resolution:

- Executive will share details on WhatsApp.

- Executive will close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- machinery, corrugated boxes, whatsapp share
